str2: Just as, as, even as. From hos and per; just as, i.e. Exactly like.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
At one time or other, at some time, formerly. From the base of pou and te; indefinite adverb, at some time, ever.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To disobey, rebel, be disloyal, refuse conformity. From apeithes; to disbelieve.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To pity, have mercy on. From eleos; to compassionate.
Willful unbelief, obstinacy, disobedience. From apeithes; disbelief.
